title: 85/246/EEC: Council Decision of 22 April 1985 giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1963) (Second EDF) for the financial year 1983
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 22 April 1985
giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1963) (Second EDF) for the financial year 1983
(85/246/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Council shall close the revenue and expenditure accounts of the European Development Fund (1963) (Second EDF) as at 31 December 1983 as follows:
- revenue: at the sum of 731 126 484,06 ECU,
- expenditure (payments): at the sum of 730 279 047,41 ECU.
The Council hereby gives a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1963) (Second EDF) for the financial year 1983.
